gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Heat 121, Magic 95
gameRecap.excerpt: The Heat defeated the Magic, 121-95. Jimmy Butler recorded 23 points, eight rebounds, and eight assists for the Heat, with Terry Rozier adding 18 points, seven assists, and six rebounds in the victory. Paolo Banchero tallied 23 points, nine rebounds, and seven assists for the Magic in the defeat. The Heat improve to 27-24, while the Magic fall to 27-24.
